name: 「初音ミク -Project DIVA- extend」 Special Collaboration Album VOCALOID extend REMIXIE
summary:
Comes with pre-orders for the PSP game.

Includes three remixed tracks from the Project Diva series, and four remixes of music from other Sega games, as sung by Miku.

The non-Project Diva Sega tunes featured are:
- "Live and Learn" (Sonic Adventure 2) - Music: Jun Senoue / Lyrics: Johnny Gioeli
- "Ignite Infinity" (Phantasy Star Portable 2 Infinity) - Music: Hideaki Kobayashi / Lyrics: Runblebee
- "Moshimo Kimi ga Negau no Nara" (Valkyria Chronicles 3) - Music: Shiro Sagisu / Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi 
- "Love 14" (Cyber Troopers Virtual-On) - Music: Kentaro Koyama / Lyrics: Meg
info:
• 发售日期: 2011-11-10
  • 播放时长: 32 min
  • 编号: PDCL-03901
